text:
Fisheries (General and Fees) Amendment Regulations (No. 3) 2017

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, make the following regulations under the Living Marine Resources Management Act 1995 .

18 September 2017

C. WARNER

Governor

By Her Excellency's Command,

JEREMY ROCKLIFF

Minister for Primary Industries and Water

1. Short title
    These regulations may be cited as the Fisheries (General and Fees) Amendment Regulations (No. 3) 2017 .

2. Commencement
        (1) These regulations, other than regulation 12, take effect on 1 October 2017.
        (2) Regulation 12 is taken to have taken effect on 1 September 2017.

3. Principal Regulations
    In these regulations, the Fisheries (General and Fees) Regulations 2016 are referred to as the Principal Regulations.

4.
    The amendments effected by this regulation have been incorporated into the authorised version of the Fisheries (General and Fees) Regulations 2016 .

5.
    The amendment effected by this regulation has been incorporated into the authorised version of the Fisheries (General and Fees) Regulations 2016 .

6.
    The amendment effected by this regulation has been incorporated into the authorised version of the Fisheries (General and Fees) Regulations 2016 .

7.
    The amendments effected by this regulation have been incorporated into the authorised version of the Fisheries (General and Fees) Regulations 2016 .

8.
    The amendments effected by this regulation have been incorporated into the authorised version of the Fisheries (General and Fees) Regulations 2016 .

9.
    The amendment effected by this regulation has been incorporated into the authorised version of the Fisheries (General and Fees) Regulations 2016 .

10.
    The amendments effected by this regulation have been incorporated into the authorised version of the Fisheries (General and Fees) Regulations 2016 .

11.
    The amendment effected by this regulation has been incorporated into the authorised version of the Fisheries (General and Fees) Regulations 2016 .

12. Rescission
    The Fisheries (General and Fees) Amendment Regulations (No.2) 2017 are rescinded.

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 20 September 2017
